alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 24 at 9:48AM MDT until June 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Colorado, including the following county, Morgan. * WHEN...Until 945 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Highway 144 remains closed between Morgan county roads 14 and 16 where flooding is already occurring. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bijou Creek and South Platte River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of West Central Morgan County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
